channel.title: Comedy on Lightweight Search Engine
channel.description: Recent content in Comedy on Lightweight Search Engine

item.title: Mythgle for Lovers
item.description:
She typed “love near me,” and there I was — top result.

Mythgle said we had a 98% compatibility score based on mutual interests:

  • Overthinking
  • Late-night snacking
  • Googling symptoms we don’t have

Now we’re engaged. Thanks, algorithm.
